item.title: Streaming MySQL changes to MongoDB with go-mysql
item.description: I’ve setup a proof-of-concept environment with docker-compose, for streaming MySQL data changes into a MongoDB collection. It’s based on the great go-mysql library. You can check out the project code in here: https://github.com/rpagliuca/stream-mysql-to-mongodb-with-go Also, here is a videocast of the project up and running:
